Is there any study showing a comparison between NEAT and the Cascade
Correlation algorithm? Or could Stanley himself points out important
differences and similarities, as well as performance measurements
(like training speed, runtime speed, size, etc...)?

(I've made a *similar* question 1 or 2 year ago but haven't got many
answers, sorry if it appears repetitive)
